ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Three: The Rising Son
ComicInfo.Series: Half Past Danger II: Dead To Reichs
ComicInfo.Summary:
Break In! The team must infiltrate the Japanese Chemical Warfare Division: Unit 731.
The prize: priceless intel on the Nazi pathogen. With the help of Ishi’s sister Emiko and with Spot the Deinonychus in tow, the daring raid is afoot. But something none of them expected lies in wait within… something BIG.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Stephen Mooney (a) & Tamra Bonvillain (c) | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Nick Roche (a) & Triona Farrell (c) | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 15:26:30. [CVDB635890]

ComicInfo.Characters: Agent Moss, Ishikawa Minamoto, John Noble
